register.description: Indicates the implemented timers in the memory map and their features. Because the platform does not implement memory-mapped timers, this register is set to all 0s.

bitfield.description: Indicates the features of timer frame 7
Indicates the features of timer frame 6
Indicates the features of timer frame 5
Indicates the features of timer frame 4
Indicates the features of timer frame 3
Indicates the features of timer frame 2
Indicates the features of timer frame 1
Indicates the features of timer frame 0
